articles.title: Genetic determinants of rheumatic heart disease risk in black Africans identified - University of Cape Town News
articles.description: A pan-African study led by UCT researchers has identified the genetic determinants of rheumatic heart disease risk in black Africans.
articles.content:
A pan-African study led by researchers at the University of Cape Town (UCT) has identified the genetic determinants of rheumatic heart disease (RHD) risk in black Africans.
